file_content.text: You're either the luckiest shot in the galaxy, or those were some seriously unlucky mercenaries. Guess I'll erase this holorecording.
Luck had nothing to do with it.
You underestimate me.
Right. I'm supposed to believe it was your amazing reflexes?
At least send me a copy of that holo, first.
But I want it.
What, for your scrapbook?
Anybody who works for you dies, got it?
I'll kill all your people.
That's pretty hard on employee morale, you know that?
Hate to cut things short, but I've got a swanky new hyperdrive to install. Love that Arkanian tech.
Take good care of the rest of my stuff, Captain. I'll be coming for it soon.
Just found out what was happening. Sorry I'm late.
The good news is, I tracked Skavak's ship to House Thul's spaceport.
He must have gone there to finish installing that hyperdrive. There's still time to get him.
I'll fly us to that other spaceport in no time.
Let's go.
Throttle down, Captain. It's not that simple.
Is Skavak a fast mechanic?
How much time?
He's handier with words than he is with a hydrospanner.
Keep being handy, and I might just let you live.
Finally, you're useful.
How inspiring.
The Empire controls House Thul. Skavak has landing clearance from the Imperials, but you'll have to sneak in on foot.
Luckily, someone here owes me a big favor. I've arranged a meeting to sneak you inside that spaceport and get the hyperdrive.
Can I trust this mysterious "someone"?
Sounds a little sketchy.
He wouldn't dare cross me. Long story.
I can't wait to see the look on Skavak's face when I show up.
I hope Skavak's there.
Bring me back a holo, and I'll broadcast it.
What if I don't make it back, gorgeous? Will you miss me?
[Flirt] I could die.
Don't be ridiculous. You always survive.
And then... boom!
Careful. That spaceport is crawling with Imperials.
My contact is at these coordinates. Oh, and there may be a way we can profit from this whole debacle.
House Alde still wants the head. That pompous gasbag Peema Ahuff will probably pay anything to get it.
It's worth a shot.
He was willing to give up a custom-built Arkanian hyperdrive for that head. I suspect he'll say a lot.
My ship's cockpit needs decorating. I could hang the head there.
Maybe I'll keep it.
Add a couple of matching throw pillows--could be nice.
He'll pay me what I want, or I'll fry him.
I'll bargain with my blaster.
Peema? I think all you'll have to do is threaten to muss his hair.
Good luck, Captain. I'll be waiting.
